abstract: Stocks drop for third straight day, closing at their lowest levels of month; investors worry that slowdown overseas, particularly in China, will hurt American companies.
lead_paragraph: The market fell sharply Thursday morning — stocks dropped close to their lowest levels of the month — before rebounding in afternoon trading to close with only slight losses.

headline.main: Wall Street Held Back by Global Unease
headline.print_headline: Global Unease Continues to Depress Wall St.

snippet: The market fell sharply Thursday morning — stocks dropped close to their lowest levels of the month — before rebounding in afternoon trading to close with only slight losses.
